an5.183:0.3: 183. Dwelling at the Root of a Tree
an5.183:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of people who dwell at the root of a tree.
an5.183:1.3: A person may dwell at the root of a tree because of stupidity … bad desires … madness … because it is praised by the Buddhas … or for the sake of having few wishes …
an5.183:1.4: These are the five kinds of people who dwell at the root of a tree.”
